name: Train Station Simulator
description: Train Station Simulator is a station builder and manager game. Create and maintain your dream station! Ride the rails and operate your ultimate grand central empire!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP 2 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz | AMD: 3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 might not fully supported. 16:9, 16:10, 21:9, 16:3 supported (Tested: 1600x900, 1600x1200, 1680x1050, 1920x1080, 1920x1200, 1920x1440, 2048x1536, 2560x1080, 2560x1440, 2560x1600, 3440x1440, 5760x1080)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (or higher) (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 2.6 GHz | AMD: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Any 1.5 GB RAM (or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 might not fully supported. 16:9, 16:10, 21:9, 16:3 supported (Tested: 1600x900, 1600x1200, 1680x1050, 1920x1080, 1920x1200, 1920x1440, 2048x1536, 2560x1080, 2560x1440, 2560x1600, 3440x1440, 5760x1080)
